name: eventfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is full of interesting or important events: The rest of my first term at the school passed much less eventfully than my first week. The day passed eventfully, with a steady stream of important visitors. Opposite
uneventfullyRelated word
eventful
More examplesFewer examplesThe match ended as eventfully as it had begun, with two goals in the final five minutes.Her day began eventfully when she fell down the stairs.He managed to get through the rest of the tour calmly and less eventfully.
